# Stone Salve
## Overview
**Aura** strong abjuration and transmutation; **CL** 13th

**Slot** —

**Price** 4,000 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This ointment has two uses. If an ounce of it is applied to the flesh of a [[Petrified|petrified]] creature, it returns the creature to flesh as the *[[Stone to Flesh (Spell)|stone to flesh]]* spell. If an ounce of it is applied to the flesh of a nonpetrified creature, it protects the creature as a *[[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]* spell.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Stone to Flesh (Spell)|stone to flesh]], [[Stoneskin (Spell)|stoneskin]]*

**Cost** 2,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 530
